channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: It appears to be a drain cover. The tarmac has sunk round it and gives the appearance now of a pothole with a raised drain cover in the centre, 7th December
item.description:
As you turn left from Pirton Lane onto Cheltenham Road East, it is right on the corner where indicated. Very difficult to avoid unless you take the corner very wide or mount the flat kerb on the left. Am very surprised as the whole junction has just been completed after months of roadworks, moving the bus stop and finishing the cycle lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two potholes on each side of the rd., 7th December
item.description:
These have been filled previously but back again
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Street, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The roundabout has been disrupted for almost 2 months restricting traffic flow, rarely is anyone working on it, it is not on your works map, we are approaching 2 race meeting events that will traffic chaos again, how much longer is this going on ? Can you remove lane restrictions when no one working at least., 7th December
item.description:
Roundabout racecourse entrance
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 30mph/national speed limit signs, 7th December
item.description:
Serious crash. Poles are led on ground for 30mph/national speed limit signs. Bypass just opposite Glos Biz Park heading to Zoons Court. Whilst resolving please collect the SEVEN lots of abandoned signage etc on that bypass reported too many times to mention & all ignored.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Sign structurally damaged/leaning more than 20 degrees/loose in ground (Non illuminating sign)

item.title: Litter bags for collection, 7th December
item.description:
Cleared up serious vehicle crash. Remains of car in pile on tarmac stretch easily collectible on bypass at junction of Glos Biz Park/Hucclecote Rd. Crew can park on tarmac central section.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Grey Fiat with no mot on Bayshill Road, 7th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Bayshill Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham

item.title: Pot hole on Charlton Rd, 7th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Charlton Lane, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
